title: 1 Falkenberg
text:
Instructions

1 BH Topspin in BH (diagonal) B: Block in BH

2 FH Topspin from BH in BH (diagonal) B: Block in FH

3 FH Topspin from FH in BH (parallel) B: Block in BH

... and repeat!

title: 3 Passive Play: Block from Middle - Outside, alternating
text:
Instructions

1 FH Block to FH

B: Topspin to BH or FH

2 FH or BH Block to FH

B: Topspin to Middle

... and repeat!

title: 4 Falkenberg (Small)
text:
Instructions

1 BH Topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to BH

2 FH Topspin from BH to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to Middle

3 FH Topspin from Middle to BH

B: Block to BH

... and repeat!

title: 7 Short Serve | FH Opening from Middle | FH Topspin
text:
Instructions

1 Short serve, free placement

B: Push to Middle long

2 VH Topspin to RH

B:Block to VH (wide)

3 FH Topspin free placement

... and finish the rally!

title: 6 BH | Middle | FH
text:
Instructions

1 BH Topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to Middle

2 FH Topspin from Middle to BH

B: Block to FH

3 FH Topspin to BH (parallel)

B: Block to BH

... and repeat!

title: 10 Middle - Outside alternating
text:
Instructions

1 FH topspin from middle to BH

B: Block to FH or BH

2 FH or BH topspin to BH

B: Block to middle

... and repeat!

title: 25 Serve long | Take over the attack
text:
Instructions

1 Serve to BH (long)

B: Topspin to BH

2 Block with kick/ spin or BH topspin to BH

B: Free play

... and finish the rally!

title: 33 FH topspin left-right
text:
Instructions

1 FH topspin to FH (diagonal)

B: Block to FH

2 FH topspin to BH (parallel)

B: Block to FH

... and repeat!

title: 36 BH | Middle | BH | FH
text:
Instructions

1 BH topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to middle

2 FH topspin from middle to BH

B: Block to BH

3 BH topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to FH

4 FH topspin to BH (parallel)

B: Block to BH

title: 39 BH Mid-Distance Positioning 2x2
text:
Instructions

1 BH counter to BH (at a medium distance from the table)

B: Counter to BH (at a medium distance)

2 BH counter to BH (after the ball, take half a step back)

B: Counter to BH (slightly further from the table)

3 BH topspin to BH (at a medium distance)

B: Block to BH (at a medium distance)

4 BH topspin to BH (after the ball, take half a step toward the table)

B: Block to BH (at a medium distance)

... and repeat!

title: 40 FH Mid-Distance Positioning 2x2
text:
Instructions

1 FH counter to FH (at a medium distance from the table)

B: Counter to FH (at a medium distance)

2 FH counter to FH (after the ball, take half a step back)

B: Counter to FH (slightly further from the table)

3 FH topspin to FH (at a medium distance)

B: Block to FH (at a medium distance)

4 FH topspin to FH (after the ball, take half a step toward the table)

B: Block to FH (at a medium distance)

... and repeat!

title: 31 Big 8 parallel
text:
Instructions

1 FH topspin from FH to BH (parallel)

B: Block to BH (diagonal)

2 BH topspin from BH to FH (parallel)

B: Block to FH (diagonal)

... and repeat!

title: 32 Big 8 diagonal
text:
Instructions

1 FH topspin to FH (diagonal)

B: Block to BH (parallel)

2 BH topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to FH (parallel)

title: 9 Short return | BH opening | FH follow-up
text:
Instructions

1 Return drill! Passive player starts with serve

B: Short underspin serve

2 Push short to BH to middle

B: Long push to BH

3 BH topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to FH

4 FH topspin to BH (parallel)

B: Free block

... and finish the rally!

title: 27 3-point Forehand
text:
Instructions

1 FH topspin from FH to BH (parallel)

B: Block to middle

2 FH topspin from middle to BH

B: Block to BH

3 FH topspin from BH to BH (diagonal)B: Block to FH

... and repeat!

title: 24 Serve side underspin | Opening from BH
text:
Instructions

1 Side underspin serve to BH (short to half-long)

B: Long push to BH

2 FH topspin or BH topspin to BH

B: Block to middle to FH

3 FH topspin across the entire table

... and finish the rally!

title: 51 2x BH topspin | 1x FH topspin from BH
text:
Instructions

1 BH topspin to BH

B: Block to BH

2 BH topspin to BH

B: Block to BH

3 FH topspin to BH

B: Block to BH

... and repeat!
